attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I call upon Gorden Brown and his team to at least on  a temporary basis to put the people of the UK and not themselves first. They have looked after themselves for quite a while now and the time has come to take other people into consideration. Show us you have a conscience

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
